title: Exterminator's Axe
content:
Exterminator's Axe Uncommon 2~18 Damage 1d12 Slashing+1d6 Fire (Conditional) Scourge of Pests: Deals an additional 1~6 Fire damage to Plants, Insects or Small Creatures. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The intricate engravings on this axe's blade and handle make plain the skill of its smith. Greataxe Two-Handed 3.15 130
